content.rendered:
Do I have to pay to use your services?

There is no charge to apply with or work for Bridge Career.

What are your hours of operation?

We are open Monday through Friday, 8:00 a.m.-5:00 p.m. We are closed for major holidays such as New Year’s Day, Memorial Day, July 4th, Labor Day, Thanksgiving and Christmas.

Do you take walk ins?

Yes! We can schedule interviews or you can drop by and interview as long as a recruiter is available.

What happens when I come to apply or interview?

We will have your fill out a basic online application (if you have not already) and then meet with a recruiter. We always recommend dressing to impress as you would with our client.

Do I need a resume?

We recommend that you bring a copy of your resume (or email a digital copy) so that we can successfully submit you to our clients. If you don’t have a resume, don’t worry, you can fill out our application and we can generate a general resume from our system.
